dict.string: The second generation was introduced as a 2003 model at the 2002 Chicago Auto Show, based on the new Impreza platform, featuring several fine-tune improvements over the past model. The 2003 Forester features weight-saving refinements such as an aluminum hood, perforated rails, and a hydro-formed front sub-frame. The most noticeable change was the offering of 2.5 L versions (normally aspirated and turbocharged) and in the U.S. the introduction of the turbocharged 2.5-liter model.
2.0 L EJ20 H4 2.0 L EJ20 turbo H4 2.5 L EJ253 H4 2.5 L EJ255 turbo H4 2.5 L EJ25 turbo H4 (JDM Forester STi)
